title: Hows the Barch program at pes?
content: Thinking of applying for it this year. Hows the faculty and facilities aspiring pes architects? Any heads up?

comments.body:
It's pretty good actually. Since it's an autonomous uni, they get to alter the courses based on what's new and required in Architecture. For instance they introduced a course called AI in Architecture for us.
The classrooms are great, they've got laser lab, a 3d printing machine and other stuff like clay modeling lab and stuff. You could utilize those for your projects.
I personally liked the Faculty as well, although I do wish some of the good ones didn't quit. We saw a great number of good faculty resigning, but hoping that doesn't happen to the rest of the good ones.
I found the projects to better than the ones VTU students receive too. In 3rd sem, we were designing a Primary Health Care centre, whereas the project for 3rd sem in VTU colleges was a tiny salon.
